snippet.title: "Colors:Zero" Game Trailer
snippet.description:
Colors:Zero is an interactive storytelling set in a neo noir universe. Within a world of noir where colors have been erased, you will play as Walter Koch, a private investigator who has a post-cognition power. You will be assigned to investigate about strange murders in Shadeon City.

Website : https://www.colors-zero.com
Interactive Trailer : https://youtu.be/Vbi9NcTIjSE
Demo Trailer 2019 : https://youtu.be/3-HVNRi7uKo

Proud of winning an Epic MegaGrants !
https://www.unrealengine.com/

Stay tuned :
Twitter : https://twitter.com/ColorsZeroGame
Subscribe : https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCbKZY3o4vZmnm0mI6VqcFeQ

Credits :
- Development
Designer & Developer : Cid
Assistant texture artist : Gaëlle  
- Voice Talents
Daniel C. Johnson
Alice Himora
Dylan Runge
CL Neal
- Music
“Detective Noir Mystery” : Vaan Fomm
“Justify the Lie” : Darren Curtis
“Born of a hero” : Fantasy Studio

#ColorsZero #UnrealEngine #CharacterCreator #iClone
